## wrapInArray() function

Wraps the input in an array even if the input is an array.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function wrapInArray<Type>(value: Type): Type[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | Type | input |

<b>Returns:</b>

Type\[\]

wrapped input in an array.

## Example


```ts
wrapInArray('a')     // ['a']
wrapInArray(1)       // [1]
wrapInArray(['a'])   // [['a']]
```
